about_the_game:
Original score for The Long Dark. Music for The Long Dark - Volume Two, features over 60 minutes of music composed by Cris Velasco (Mass Effect, God of War, Overwatch, Resident Evil 7, etc.) and Sascha Dikiciyan (Borderlands, Quake III, Mass Effect).

Volume Two includes the entire soundtrack for WINTERMUTE Episode Three: "Crossroads Elegy", as well as additional music from Survival Mode.
detailed_description:
Original score for The Long Dark. Music for The Long Dark - Volume Two, features over 60 minutes of music composed by Cris Velasco (Mass Effect, God of War, Overwatch, Resident Evil 7, etc.) and Sascha Dikiciyan (Borderlands, Quake III, Mass Effect).

Volume Two includes the entire soundtrack for WINTERMUTE Episode Three: "Crossroads Elegy", as well as additional music from Survival Mode.
